price: (Muusaan) ni jedhe: “Waanan irraanfadheef na hin qabin, Dhimma kiyya irraas rakkoo na hin baachisin.”
arabic: قَالَ لَا تُؤَاخِذۡنِي بِمَا نَسِيتُ وَلَا تُرۡهِقۡنِي مِنۡ أَمۡرِي عُسۡرٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla lā tuākhidh'nī bimā nasītu walā tur'hiq'nī min amrī ʿus'ran
